title: aineniamh/squirrel
description: Some QUIck Rearranging to Resolve Evolutionary Links.

input_options.title: Input Options
input_options.description: Define where the pipeline should find input data and save output data.

clade.title: Clade
clade.description: Specify whether the alignment is primarily for `cladei` or `cladeii`.

seq_qc.title: Run Sequence QC
seq_qc.description: Flag potentially problematic SNPs and sequences.
seq_qc.help_text: Note that if run_phylo is also selected this additionally run qc based on the phylogenetic tree.

additional_mask.title: Additional Mask
additional_mask.description: CSV file describing additional sites to mask.
additional_mask.help_text: Squirrel can be run twice, and the sites file generated the first time can be passed back.

outgroups.title: Outgroups
outgroups.description: Specify which MPXV outgroup(s) in the alignment to use in the phylogeny.
outgroups.help_text: These are used only by the phylogenetics module and will get pruned out from the final tree.

assembly_refs.title: Assembly References
assembly_refs.description: References to check for `calls to reference` against, used only by the sequence QC process.

output_options.title: Output Options
output_options.description: Parameters for saving and naming workflow outputs.

out_dir.title: Output folder name
out_dir.description: Directory for output of all user-facing files.

advanced_options.title: Advanced Options
advanced_options.description: Advanced options for configuring processes inside the workflow.

extract_cds.title: Extract CDS
extract_cds.help_text: Extract ccoding sequences based on coordinates in the reference.

concatenate.title: Concatenate CDS
concatenate.description: Concatenate coding sequences for each genome, separated by `NNN`.
concatenate.help_text: Default: write out as separate records.

miscellaneous_options.title: Miscellaneous Options
miscellaneous_options.help_text:
These options are common to all nf-core pipelines and allow you to customise some of the core preferences for how the pipeline runs.

Typically these options would be set in a Nextflow config file loaded for all pipeline runs, such as `~/.nextflow/config`.

docs.intro: asquirrel is an analysis tool to run QC and alignment and to construct phylogenetic trees, developed for mpxv.
